titleStmt.title: Sample B14 from The Atlanta Constitution
November 4, 1961, p.1 "Homecoming Games..." by Ralph McGill March 6, 1961, "Republicans and..." by Ralph McGill April 17,1961, "Legislators Face..." by Reg Murphy "Potomac Fever" by Fletcher Knebel

editionStmt.edition: A part of the XML version of the Brown Corpus

availability.p: Used by permission of The Atlanta Constitution,Reg Murphy and Fletcher Knebel

encodingDesc.p: Typographical Errors: lines misplaced [1490-1500] corrected in copyisa [1620]compelte [1670]
